title: Janez Peternel
text: Janez Peternel (26 December 1913 – 30 November 1943) was a Yugoslav <a href="cycle%20sport">cyclist</a>, who rode for Hermes Ljubljana. He won <a href="Tour%20of%20Serbia">Tour of Serbia</a> in 1940. He died as <a href="partisan%20%28military%29">partisan</a> in <a href="World%20War%20II">World War II</a>.
